title: Virtual Reality Poro

embed.description: Album with topic of Creativity, tagged with league of legends; uploaded by LewdPenetration. Virtual Reality Poro :3

body:
Hi Riot and fellow summoners. I recent invested in a Steam Vive and got Tilt Brush. Its an Art program for Virtual Reality. My friends said I should make a Poro.  SOO I painted a Poro, took a pic and was able to make a .gif (cuz tiltbrush makes that stupid easy)   its ALLL in the link.

Let me know what you guys think :3

http://i.imgur.com/Z1quQBQ.png 

I previously posted this, but Riot deleted it {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} and said i need to move it to this board, soooo HERE it is [again] {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
I love roomscale VR :D

Good shape on the body of the poro, though those are quite unusual shapes for its horns - I think they're more often a tight curl, close to the head/body.  The tongue is appropriately massive, but maybe a little pointed at the end.

Love your use of brushes too - was the long bristles brush not a good fit for the fur?  I could imagine it didn't convey the softness of a poro so I trust your choice :D

(Also really?  Not the snowy/snowman background?  Missed opportunity ;))
